Notify me when a new episode of an anime I\'m watching or chapter of a manga I\'m reading comes out
This is how ofter all the data on the anime/manga lists will be refreshed. If you\'re signed into Anilist, your list data will be synced as well. Value is in minutes.

Logging in will replace all your existing data with data from your AniList account. Are you sure you want to continue?

If you don\'t like Rory Mercury then you suffer from an uncurable disease called terrible taste and your waifu is trash ^-^ \n \nImage by nyoro on Pixiv

You navigate to different parts of this app by swiping left and right. 
 
 You'll start out on your home screen where you can search for anime/manga/LN/characters, or look for anime by season. 
 Your searches will show up there as well. 
 
 From your home screen, swipe right: 
 Once to get to waifu list 
 Again to get to settings 
 
 Or left: 
 Once to get to your anime PTW list 
 Again to get to your manga/LN PTR list

Crunchyroll, Funimation, Netfilx, Amazon and other western so-called legal anime licensors/streaming services are killing anime and the anime fandom in the west through their anti-competitive practices, providing a grossly inferior service, and forceful insertion of their politics into their product/service. These companies are neither a charity, nor your friend. They do not care about Japanese creators, their work, or the fans at all (and in fact resent them). You are not supporting the industry in any way by subscribing to these services and paying money for them. You should strongly consider cancelling your subscription and using pirate streams. If you want video quality, download a torrent from a fansub site. If you want to support the industry, buy blurays and/or merchandise directly from Japan.

If you\'d like to support me or Kirino\'s development (and potential future support for other platforms like GNU/Linux, PSVita, or Switch), you can donate. There are no special donation rewards; you can fully use all features of Kirino for free. \n \n Google takes 30% of any amount donated.
Could not find a stream :( Contact masterani.me and ask them to upload this anime onto their site
An error occured while fetching from Gelbooru. Perhaps the API is down
Add a waifu that isn\'t on AniList
Any non-AniList waifus you add will obviously not be synced through AniList. They will also not be overwritten when signing into an AniList account.
You\'ve reached the end of all the currently available chapters
There is a next chapter, but you have not downloaded it yet. It is being downloaded now. Make sure you have internet, wait a few seconds, and then try again
There\'s no more chapters before this one
There is a previous chapter, but you have not downloaded it yet. It is being downloaded now. Make sure you have internet, wait a few seconds, and then try again

- Small bugfixes (or perhaps just blindly sweeping stuff under the rug, I haven\'t been able to replicate the bug in question) \n \n - Manga reader is quite a bit slicker: automatically downloads the next chapter, seamless transition from one chapter to the next (or previous) inside the reader, and can download multiple chapters all at once (no more dialog box with the "download progress" bar)
